0.name: Sarah
0.bio: Sarah grew up next to a river and has always loved it. She knew that her career needed to include water, and serving as a river guide has been the perfect fit. She specializes in training beginners as well as guiding rafts through complex rapids.

1.name: Mark
1.bio: Mark just graduated with a degree in Recreational Managment. He interned with us during his schooling, and has now been a full time guide here for over a year. He is high energy and specializes in overnight trips.

2.name: Chris
2.bio: Chris has been rafting for over 20 years. He started working as a part time guide 10 years ago. After he retired he started working full time with us. His experience makes him great on all routes and with all levels of rafters.
